title: Тетрис
subtitle: subtitle
text:
1989 would represent the year Tetris reached millions of households around the world.

During this year Nintendo published versions for its NES and Gameboy consoles, which became a huge commercial success: both versions combined sold more than 43 million units worldwide.

title: miscellaneous information
subtitle: subtitle

about tetris effect and other information

occurs when people devote so much time and attention to an activity that it begins to pattern their thoughts, mental images, and dreams.

title: Still here.
subtitle: subtitle
text: The game is available on over 65 platforms, setting a Guinness world record for the most ported video game title.
imgcaption: 2018's Tetris Effect. Produced by Tetsuya Mizuguchi. Developed by Monstars and Resonair.
